hours_text:
#  Learn. Grow. Create. Collect.

## At Lighthouse ArtCenter

[ Learn More ](https://lighthousearts.org/about/our-mission-history/)

#  Impact in Our Community

Play Video

The nominations are in and the response was overwhelming! We are excited to announce that Lighthouse ArtCenter was voted as one of the best art galleries in Palm Beach County. The contest is held by the Palm Beach Post every year. We are grateful for the support of our entire community and we can’t wait for you to see all that we have coming up.

### Now Enrolling

Radiant Arrangements: Designing with Many Stones with Lisa Johnson

Tuesdays | 10am-1pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/radiant-arrangements/)

Coloring Outside the Lines: Freeform Embroidery with Kerri On

Thursdays | 9am-12pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/freeform-embroidery/)

Seaside Jewelry with Lisa Johnson

Thursdays | 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/seaside-jewelry/)

Pots with Personality with Caroline Duran

Fridays | 1-4pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/pots-with-personality/)

Advanced Wheel with Chad Steve

Wednesdays | 9am - 12pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/advanced-wheel/)

Painting with Glass with Carolyn Austin

Tuesdays | 9am - 12pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/painting-with-glass/)

Circles and More

Thursdays | 9am-12pm 

[Register](https://lighthousearts.org/classes/circles-and-more/)

admission_text:
#  Admission & Directions

### Hours:

**Mon - Thu** : 9:00 am - 5:00 pm  
**Fri** : 9:00 am - 4:00 pm  
**Sat** :10:00 am - 4:00 pm  
**Sun** : Closed

### Admission:

$5 donation for nonmembers; free for members
